org.tribuo.classification.sgd.objectives

Class LogMulticlass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tribuo.classification.sgd.objectives.LogMulticlass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.config.Configurable, com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.Provenancable<com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.ConfiguredObjectProvenance>, LabelObjective

    public class LogMulticlass
extends Object
implements LabelObjective
    A multiclass version of the log loss.

    Generates a probabilistic model, and uses an ExpNormalizer.
